Obtain First Order Access Codes
Install Surveillance Node into the Control Panel on the side of the comm tower in the First Order District or Trick a First Order member into giving you the Access Codes
Order Food from Docking Bay 7
Docking Bay 7 can be found near the Millennium Falcon in Black Spire Outpost. Click on the highlighted building to order unique foods only available on Batuu!
Track Down the Criminal
Click on Sims in Batuu and Ask about the Criminal's Whereabouts.
Obtain a Dataspike
Ask people around Batuu if they know of ways to obtain a dataspike.
Retrieve Supplies from First Order Supply Crates
First Order Supply Crates can be found in the First Order District.
Obtain the package for Hondo

Travel to the First Order District by using your phone. When you arrive, there will be a Control Panel on the wall in front of you. Analyze and slice into the panel in order to Bypass the Security Door.
Acquire Information Fragments around Batuu
Open Supply Crates, Slice Control Panels, or talk to people around Batuu to gather valuable information.
Gather Resistance Supplies from Crates
Search for Supply Crates around Batuu and override their locks to gain access to their contents.
Gather Resistance Supplies from Scrap Piles
Look for Scrap Piles around Batuu and search them. You are bound to find something that can help the Resistance.
Ask for Food Donation from Docking Bay 7
The Resistance is in need of food supplies. Head to Docking Bay 7 in Black Spire Outpost to see if 'Cookie' will be willing to donate any food.
Obtain a First Order Officer Uniform
Find a First Order Officer and convince them to give you a First Order uniform.
Obtain a First Order Officer ID Card
Rumor has it that Dok-Ondar or Hondo Ohnaka have access to very convincing First Order IDs.
Prepare for the Rescue Mission (optional)

Items like a Blaster Pistol, Lightsaber, Droid, Thermal Detonator, Electrobinoculars and Comlink may be helpful on this mission. These items can be obtain from Hondo or the Holotable if you have enough reputation with that faction by purchasing gear.
Gather Supplies for the Mission on the Falcon (optional)
Prepare for the Business Trip (optional)

Items like a Blaster Pistol, Droid, Thermal Detonator, or Fake ID may be helpful for this trip. These items can be obtained from Hondo or the Holotable if you have enough reputation with that faction by purchasing gear.
Order Free Drinks at The Cantina
Hondo is fronting the bill for a job well done. Be sure to enjoy it while it lasts. Click on the bar and Order Free Drink.
Find Dok-Ondar’s Lost Antiquities
Find Lost Antiquities by asking citizens and searching around Batuu.
Prepare for the Scouting Mission (optional)

Gather helpful items like a Dataspike, Droid, Blaster, and Comlink. These can all prove useful on this mission. These items can be obtained from Hondo or the Holotable if you have enough reputation with that faction by purchasing gear.
Gather Supplies for the Heist (optional)

Items like a Thermal Detonator, Electrobinoculars, and Comlink will be helpful on this mission. These items can be obtain from Hondo or the Holotable if you have enough reputation with that faction by purchasing gear.
Obtain Comm Tower Access Codes
With a Dataspike in your inventory, find a Control Panel in the First Order District and analyze it to find the best method of slicing it to obtain Access Codes.
Compile Information Fragments into a Batuu Report
Click on Information Fragments in your Sims inventory to compile them into a Batuu Report.
Use First Order Holotable to obtain Log Files
You’ll have to find a way to get past the First Order security door. Once inside click on the Holotable and Enter Access Codes.
Fly the TIE echelon
Click on the TIE echelon and Perform Test Flight to ensure the upgrades were installed properly.
Patrol Batuu in TIE echelon
The TIE echelon can be found docked in the First Order District.
Fly the TIE echelon to Protect the Satellite Relay
The TIE echelon can be found docked in the First Order District.
Explore Batuu Communities in the X-wing
Click on the X-wing in the Resistance Encampment and Explore Batuu Communities.
Patrol Batuu for Suspicious Activity
Click a location on the ground to Go on Patrol.
Run Diagnostics on Control Panels
Click on Control Panels around the First Order District and Run Diagnostics to make sure everything is in order.
Install First Order Surveillance System on Comm Tower Control Panel
Click on the Control Panel attached to the First Order Comm Tower near the Droid Depot and Install First Order Surveillance System.
Gather Supplies from Supply Crates
Click on Supply Crates and Attempt to Override Locks in order to gain access to their contents.
Use the Resistance or First Order Holotable to Locate the Contraband
The Holotables can be found in the Resistance or First Order neighborhoods. Use them to Locate Contraband Shipments to find where it’s being stored.
Triangulate the Location of the Scientist
Click on the Holotable in the First Order Cargo building to Triangulate the Scientist’s Location.
Install First Order Surveillance on Control Panels
Slice into any Control Panels around Batuu to install First Order Surveillance Nodes.
Install First Order Surveillance on Control Panels in Black Spire Outpost
Slice into any Control Panels in Black Spire Outpost to Install First Order Surveillance.
Install Upgrades to the TIE echelon
Click on the TIE echelon in the First Order District and Install Upgrades.
Input First Order Log Files into the Resistance Holotable
With the First Order Log Files obtained, travel to the Resistance Encampment and click on the holotable in the Resistance Bunker to Input First Order Log Files.
Analyze the TIE echelon
The TIE echelon can be located in the First Order District. Analyze it to gain information about its construction.
Beat Hondo Ohnaka in a game of Sabacc
Find an open Sabaac Table in Oga's Cantina and play a game with Hondo Ohnaka. Keep a close eye on him, as he is known to cheat.
Repair the TIE echelon
The TIE echelon has some faulty panels that need to be repaired. It can be found docked near the First Order Cargo building.
Reseal First Order Crates
Reseal open Supply Crates in the First Order District. A couple of them can be found outside the First Order Cargo building.
Slice any Control Panel in the First Order District and Access its Data
Travel to the First Order District. Click on Control Panels and slice into them and gather First Order data.
Access Data on the First Order Comm Tower
There is a Comm Tower located behind the Droid Depot in the First Order District. Click on the Control Panel attached to the Comm Tower, and slice into it in order to access it's data.
Scramble First Order Starfighter Traffic Monitoring Systems
Click on the Control Panel attached to the Comm Tower behind the Droid Depot. Slice into it to Scramble First Order Ship Monitoring Systems.
Replace X-wing Parts
5 Parts are missing from the X-wing. Ask Resistance Members where to find repair parts. Once you have obtained enough click on the X-wing in the Resistance Encampment to replace the parts.
Test the Encryption Sequence on the First Order Cargo Building Security Door
There is a security door in the First Order Cargo building. Click on it to Test Encryption Sequence.
Obtain the Encryption Sequence for the First Order Security Door
Obtain the Defector’s Description from the Resistance Holotable
The Resistance Holotable can be found in the basement of the Resistance Bunker. Click on the holotable and Get Defector's Description.
Access Plans from the First Order Holotable
You will need to wear the First Order Uniform and obtain the ID in order to Access the Plans on the First Order holotable.
Ask for Chewbacca's Help
Click on the Millennium Falcon in Black Spire Outpost and Ask for Chewbacca's Help.
Click on the X-wing in the Resistance Encampment to Fly Rescue Mission.
Fly Rescue Mission in X-wing
Obtain the Jamming Array Schematics
Click on the First Order Holotable in the First Order Cargo building to Obtain Jamming Array Schematics.
Run a diagnostic on the TIE echelon
It has been a while since we ran diagnostics on the TIE echelon. It can be found docked near the First Order Cargo building.
Sabotage a Control Panel in the First Order District
Click on Control Panels in the First Order District and slice into them in order sabotage them.
Sabotage First Order Supply Crates
Click on Supply Crates in the First Order District to sabotage them.
Disrupt the Resistance in the Forest

Infiltrate the Resistance encampment to sabotage their Comm Tower, X-wing, or Holotable.\n\nHondo can help you with a disguise if you are finding it too difficult to infiltrate the Resistance Encampment.
Sabotage the TIE echelon
Click on the TIE echelon in the First Order District to sabotage it.
Disrupt First Order Transmission
There is a Comm Tower near the Droid Depot that is relaying First Order transmissions. Click on the attached control panel on the Comm Tower to disrupt their transmissions.
Scramble First Order Records of Chewbacca
Slice into any control panel in the First Order District to Scramble Chewbacca's Location Data.
Erase First Order Records of You
You will need to Slice into the First Order Holotable located in the First Order Cargo building. Be sure to bring a couple Dataspikes.
Survey First Order Supply Crates
Survey Supply Crates located in the First Order District to gain information about the supplies the First Order has access to.
Transfer Prisoners to a Prison Ship Off-World
Click on the TIE echelon, after arresting the sympathizers, and Transfer Prisoners Off-World.
Perform Maintenance on the X-wing
Click on the X-wing in the Resistance Encampment and Perform Maintenance.
Arrest Resistance Sympathizers
Locate Resistance Sympathizers around the First Order District and Check ID in order to detain them.
Ask Lt. Agnon to Join the First Order
Travel to the First Order District. Lt. Agnon can be found outside of the First Order Cargo building. Look for the First Order icon over his head.
Check IDs of Suspicious Citizens
Look for non First Order members tampering with Supply Crates in the First Order District. Check their ID to ensure They are not part of the Resistance.
Arrest the Wanted Criminal
The criminal has been seen hanging out in Oga’s Cantina from 9PM - 5AM. Click on Sims in Oga's Cantina during that time and Check ID to Identify Criminal.
Deliver the Contraband to Hondo
Hondo Ohnaka can be found in Oga's Cantina. Deliver the Contraband to him.
Convince the Scientist to Work for the First Order
The Scientist hangs out at Oga's Cantina. Locate them and Charm, Seduce, Intimidate, or Bribe. Do whatever you must to get them to join the First Order.
Delay a Stormtrooper Patrol
Click on Stormtroopers in the First Order District to delay them.
Deliver the package to Hondo
Return to Hondo in Oga's Cantina and give him the package he requested.
Bring the Scientist to Lt. Agnon
After convincing the Scientist, Report Back to Lt. Agnon.
Deliver the Spy to Kylo Ren
After you identify the spy, click on Kylo Ren to turn them in. He will verify your suspicions to see if you were successful.
Distract a First Order Officer
Click on a First Order Officer in the First Order District to distract them.
Eavesdrop on non First Order members
Click on people around Batuu and Eavesdrop on them for information.
Check IDs and Make an Arrest
Click on Sims around Batuu and their Check ID until you find someone that is suspicious.
Disperse Loiterers
Click on Batuu Citizens loitering around the First Order District and disperse them.
Intimidate Citizens
Click on Sims around Batuu and intimidate them to ensure they do not cause trouble.
Report Back to any First Order Member
When you finish checking the control panels, report back to any First Order Member
Spread First Order Propaganda
Click on non First Order Sims in Batuu and Spread First Order Propaganda.
Recruit 2 people to the First Order
Click on non First Order Sims in Batuu and attempt to Recruit to First Order.
Recruit and gain information from Informants
Click on Sims and attempt to Recruit as Informant. If they accept your bribe you can pay that informant for information.
Give Report to Lt. Agnon of the First Order (optional)
Lt. Agnon can be found by the First Order Cargo building in the First Order District.
Give Report to Vi Moradi of the Resistance (optional)
Vi Moradi can be found near the X-wing in the Resistance Encampment.
Give Report to Hondo Ohnaka (Optional)
Hondo Ohnaka can be found in Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost.
Go on Patrol to Monitor Citizens
Click on Sims around Batuu and Check ID to ensure they are not up to anything suspicious.
Help Batuu Citizens
Find and click on Batuu Citizens in Black Spire Outpost and Offer Help.
Raise Morale of Resistance Members
Click on Resistance members in the Resistance Encampment and Raise Moral.
Acquire a Dataspike from the Scoundrel Contact
Scoundrels on Batuu run jobs for Hondo Ohnaka and can be found hanging out in Oga’s Cantina.
Ask about the First Order
Click on Sims in Batuu to Ask about First Order
Ask about the Resistance
Click on Sims in Batuu to Ask about Resistance
Ask about Scoundrels
Click on Sims in Batuu to Ask about Scoundrels
Complete the Lightsaber Challenge
Look for your challenger around Black Spire Outpost. They can be seen training with their lightsaber and will have an icon over their head.
Question non-First Order members about the Resistance
Click on non First Order members around Batuu to Question about Resistance.
Recruit New Resistance Members
Click on non Resistance members and Recruit to Resistance.
Report Back to Any Resistance Member
Return to any Resistance Member in the Resistance Encampment to deliver the information you have gathered.
Report Back to Lt. Agnon
Report Back to Lt. Agnon outside the First Order Cargo building to deliver the information you have gathered.
Deliver Supplies to a First Order Officer
First Order Officers can be found around the First Order District. They can be seen wearing their signature First Order cap.
Report back to Kylo Ren
Find Kylo Ren in the First Order District and Report Back to him.
Report your failures to Kylo Ren
Find Kylo Ren in the First Order District and inform him of your failures in the Cantina.
Report Back to Kylo Ren
Supreme Leader Kylo Ren awaits you near the First Order Cargo building.
Report back to Kylo Ren
Find Kylo Ren in the First Order District and report on your patrols.
Report Back to Vi Moradi
Vi Moradi can be found near the X-wing in the Resistance Encampment.
Report back to Vi Moradi
Find Vi Moradi near the X-wing in the Resistance Encampment and Report Back.
Obtain Passcode to the Contraband Location
The contraband owner can be found in Oga's Cantina. It is said that they enjoy Dagobah Slug Slingers. Maybe if you give them enough, they may slip you the passcode on accident.
Deliver the Supplies to the Resistance
Click on any Resistance member in the Resistance Encampment to deliver the supplies you have gathered.
Deliver Supplies to the Resistance
Click on any Resistance Member in the Resistance Encampment to deliver the supplies you have gathered.
Deliver Food to Members of the Resistance
Click on any Resistance member to deliver the food you have gathered.
Report Back to any Resistance member
After gathering valuable First Order Data, return to the Resistance Encampment and Report Back to any Resistance member.
Meet with Vi Moradi
Vi Moradi can be found in the Resistance Encampment near the X-wing.
Recite Passphrase to Scoundrel Informant
The Scoundrel Informant can be found in Oga's Cantina. Click on them to Recite the Passphrase.
Steal Prototype Blaster from the First Order

There is a Supply Crate located inside the First Order Cargo building. Override the Locks in order to obtain its contents.\n\nThis will be no easy task. The guards are said to have shifts and we recommend building a droid to help distract them.
Deliver the Prototype Blaster to the Informant
The Scoundrel Informant usually hangs around Oga's Cantina. Find them and deliver the Prototype Blaster.
Report Back to Vi Moradi
Vi Moradi can be found near the X-wing in the Resistance Encampment.
Find the Defector in the Cantina
Look for the Defector in the Cantina. Be careful not to ask the wrong person about the First Order Plans or you could scare off the Defector.
Listen to the Defector’s Information
Click on the Defector in the Cantina and Listen to Secret Information.
Report back to Vi Moradi
Watch out for the patrolling Stormtroopers. Report Back to Vi Moradi in the Resistance Encampment.
Get Update from Rey
Rey can be found near the X-wing in the Resistance Encampment.
Report Back to Vi Moradi
Click on Vi Moradi after you complete the rescue mission and Report Back.
Report your Success to Rey
Rey can be found near the X-wing in the Resistance Encampment.
Celebrate your Victory!
Click on Resistance Members and Tell Tales of Victory to celebrate and recall your triumphs over the First Order.
Share Fake Information to Find the Spy

Look for First Order Officers in the First Order District with icons above their head. share 3 pieces of fake info with them to uncover the true spy.\n\nPay close attention to their responses as that will be valuable information when determining who to turn into Kylo Ren.
Talk to First Order Stormtroopers
Stormtroopers can be found patrolling around the First Order District. Talk to them to see if they share any valuable information.
Spread First Order Propaganda
Talk to non First Order members on Batuu and run the Spread First Order Propaganda interaction.
Play the First Sabacc Opponent
Look for a Sim with the Scoundrel icon above their head. Click on them to Play First Round of Sabacc Tournament.
Play the Second Sabacc Opponent
Look for a Sim with the Scoundrel icon above their head. Click on them to Play Second Round of Sabacc Tournament.
Click on Hondo and Discuss Business Trip Outcome to see how the trip went.
Bring the Information to Rey
Rey can be found near the X-wing in the Resistance Encampment.
Look for a Sim with the Scoundrel icon above their head. Click on them to Play Third Round of Sabacc Tournament.
Play the Third Sabacc Opponent
Discuss the Tournament Outcome with Hondo
Claim your prize from Hondo once you’ve played all three rounds.
Ask Hondo about Valuables around Batuu.
Click on Hondo in Oga's Cantina to ask about valuable items around Batuu.
Sell Valuables to Hondo (optional)
Sell any valuable item to Hondo Ohnaka for Scoundrel Reputation.
Sell Valuables to Vi Moradi of the Resistance (optional)
Vi Moradi can be found by the X-wing in the Resistance Encampment. Sell valuable First Order or Scoundrel items to her for Resistance Reputation.
Sell Valuables to Lt. Agnon of the First Order (optional)
Lt. Agnon can be found by the First Order Cargo building in the First Order District. Sell valuable Resistance or Scoundrel items to him for First Order Reputation.
Sell Information to Vi Moradi of the Resistance (optional)
Find Vi Moradi near the X-wing in the Resistance Encampment. Sell Classified Information to her for Resistance Reputation.
Sell Information to Lt. Agnon of the First Order (optional)
Find Lt. Agnon near the First Order Cargo building in the First Order District. Sell Classified Information to him for First Order Reputation.
Sell Information to Hondo (optional)
Find Hondo in Oga's Cantina and Deliver the Classified Information to him.
Share Tales of Misdeeds
Share Tales of Misdeed with your fellow scoundrels for increased relationship during the celebration!
Gather Classified Information from Around Batuu
Speak to Scoundrel, Resistance, or First Order members to gather Classified Information. Hacking Control Panels and Holotables can also be used to uncover this information.
Give Hondo the Scouting Report
Find Hondo Ohnaka and give him your scouting report of Canto Bight.
Recruit People for the Heist
Find people around Batuu and attempt to recruit them for the heist.
Tell Hondo You are Ready for the Heist
Click on Hondo in Oga's Cantina and tell him you are Ready for the Heist.
Discuss Business Trip with Hondo
Tell Hondo Ohnaka how the heist went.
Report Back to Hondo
Let Hondo know that you have successfully erased the records.
Stay and Party!
The party continues for 24 hours or as long as you stay at the Cantina. Travel to a different neighborhood when you want to end the celebration.
Freshen Up at the Dwelling
The Dwelling can be found across from Savi's Workshop in Black Spire Outpost. Click on the highlighted building and Freshen Up to solve your Sims Hygiene and Bladder Needs.
Plan your Batuu Outfit at the Dwelling
The Dwelling can be found across from Savi's Workshop in Black Spire Outpost. Click on the highlighted building and Plan Batuu Outfit to customize your look while on Batuu.
Fly Distraction Mission
Once the X-wing is repaired, click on it to Fly Distraction Mission.
Destroy the Equipment on the TIE echelon
Requires the Jamming Array Schematics
Obtain the Contraband on Black Spire Outpost
Using the information you gathered from the holotable, and the passcode, locate the correct control panel in order to obtain the contraband.
Obtain the Contraband in the First Order District
Using the information you gathered from the holotable, and the passcode, locate the correct control panel in order to obtain the contraband.
Assist Chewbacca on the Millennium Falcon
When you’re ready, click on the Falcon to Assist Chewbacca.
Complete the Business Trip
Click on the Millennium Falcon to Go on Business Trip.
Ask Dok-Ondar about Special Errand
Dok-Ondar has a special errand he needs taken care of. Go speak with him at his shop in Black Spire Outpost.
Deliver Lost Antiquities to Dok-Ondar
Return the Lost Antiquities to Dok-Ondar by clicking on his shop in Black Spire Outpost.
Speak with Chewbacca on the Millennium Falcon
Click on the Millennium Falcon in Black Spire Outpost and Speak with Chewbacca.
Report Back to Chewbacca
Click on the Millennium Falcon and Report Back to Chewbacca.
Pilot Millennium Falcon in Scouting Mission
Click on the Millennium Falcon and Take Off for Scouting Mission.
Complete the Heist
Click on the Millennium Falcon and Fly to Canto Bight to begin the heist.
Unlock Supply Crates
Recruit 3 Sims to Join the First Order
Reach rank 2, Recruit, with the First Order faction, and select Convince to Enlist in the First Order when clicking on a Sim with a neutral Batuu Reputation.
Seize Goods From 2 Supply Crates in Black Spire Outpost
Travel to Black Spire Outpost, find a supply crate, successfully override the locks, and open the supply crate to seize the goods.
Check ID of 5 Batuu Citizens
Reach rank 1, Supporter, with the First Order faction, click on a Batuu Citizen, and choose Check ID.
Arrest a Member of the Resistance
Select a suspicious Sim and choose Check ID.
Complete 2 Missions for the First Order
Missions can be chosen after selecting Ask to See Missions on Lt. Agnon, found near the First Order Cargo in the First Order District.
Explore 5 times in the TIE echelon
Reach Rank 5, Sergeant, with the First Order, and select Explore on the TIE echelon in the First Order District.
Infiltrate the Resistance Bunker and Slice the Holotable
Slice into the Security Door leading to the Resistance Bunker. Then avoid the patrols and slice into the Holotable.
Reach First Order Reputation Rank 5
Complete Missions for the First Order to reach rank 5, Sergeant, with the First Order faction.
Visit Every Neighborhood on Batuu
Travel to Batuu by using your phone to Take Vacation. Once on Batuu you can Travel to the different neighborhoods using the phone to get to the map.
Ask about Resistance or First Order presence on Batuu
Talk to Batuu Citizens and members of the three factions to Ask about Resistance or First Order to learn more about their presence on Batuu.
Complete a Mission for the Resistance or First Order Faction
Ask to See Missions from Lt. Agnon, select a mission, and then complete it. You can also Ask about Resistance on any Resistance member, then Ignite the Spark, select a mission, and complete it.
Recruit 3 Sims to the Resistance
Reach Resistance Rank 2, Recruit, and choose Inspire to Join the Resistance when clicking on a Sim with a neutral Batuu Reputation.
Explore the Caves of Batuu
Select Explore Batuu Caves on the cave entrance found near the waterfall in the Resistance Encampment.
Explore 5 times in the X-wing
Reach rank 5, Sergeant, with the Resistance faction, and select Explore on the X-wing in the Resistance Encampment.
Obtain a Droid Companion
BB Unit and R Unit droids can be ordered from the Droid Depot in the First Order District. Droid purchase will require scrap metal that can be found around Batuu or purchased from the Droid Depot.
Complete 2 Missions for the Resistance
Missions can be chosen after selecting Ask about Resistance, then Ignite the Spark on any Resistance member.
Override Locks and Loot 2 Supply Crates in the First Order District
Travel to the First Order District, find a supply crate, successfully override the locks, and open the supply crate, all while avoiding the attention of the Stormtroopers patrolling the area.
Infiltrate the First Order Cargo Building and Slice the Holotable
Slice into the Security Door in the First Order Cargo building to gain access to the restricted area. Then bypass the patrol to run a slice interaction on the Holotable.
Introduce Self to 3 Resistance Members
Find a Resistance aligned Sim and choose an Introduction.
Reach Resistance Reputation Rank 5
Complete Missions for the Resistance to reach rank 5, Sergeant, in the Resistance faction.
Order a Drink at Oga's Cantina
Find Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost near the Millennium Falcon. Once inside "Order Drink" from a Bartender.
Play 5 Rounds of Sabacc
Find Sabacc tables in Oga's Cantina, then select the table and choose "Play Sabacc" or "Join Game". Sabacc tables can also be purchased and placed at home.
Reach Programming Level 3

Increase your Sim's Programming Skill through interactions with control panels, and supply crates while on Batuu. At home run interactions under the programming category on computers to increase programming skill.
Skim Credits from 3 Control Panels
Select a Control Panel and choose a Slice interaction. Once successful choose Skim Credits.
Swindle 2 Sims
Reach Scoundrel Rank 1, Rookie, and then select a Sim and Swindle For Credits.
Have more than 5,000 Galactic Credits
Earn Galactic Credits by completing missions, skimming credits from control panels, or winning hands of Sabacc.
Open Supply Crate
Find a Supply Crate, successfully Override the Locks and open to loot the crate.
Successfully Cheat and Win At Sabacc
Play or join a game of Sabacc, after the game has started click on the table and select Cheat at Sabacc.
Complete 5 Missions for the Scoundrel Faction
Missions can be chosen after selecting Ask to See Missions on Hondo Ohnaka found in Oga's Cantina in Black Spire Outpost.
Successfully Bribe a First Order Stormtrooper
Reach Scoundrel Rank 2, Runner, then find a Stormtrooper and select Bribe.
Explore 5 times in the Millennium Falcon
Reach Rank 5, Outlaw, with the Scoundrel faction, and select Explore on the Millennium Falcon in Black Spire Outpost.
Reach Scoundrel Reputation Rank 5
Complete Missions for Hondo Ohnaka to reach rank 5, Outlaw, with the Scoundrel faction.

{0.SimFirstName} sees a commotion in the distance. Upon investigating, {0.SimFirstName} finds themselves in the middle of a rowdy crowd watching an illegal droid battle!

{0.SimFirstName} suggests the Galma citizens offer them credits in exchange for silence. {0.SimFirstName} thinks it’s a fair trade -- the citizens get to have their fun and {M0.he}{F0.she} walks away with credits!
Ask For More
Take Bribe

Repair Droid
Salvage Scrap Metal

{0.SimFirstName} joins in on the fun, watching the battle and picking {M0.his}{F0.her} favorites to win. {0.SimFirstName} wins credits. After the fight has ended, {0.SimFirstName} notices a parts pile has been left behind in the dust.

{0.SimFirstName} slices into the keypad and opens the compartment to find a small pouch. {0.SimFirstName} glances around carefully to make sure no one is watching, then pockets the pouch. {M0.He}{F0.She} will investigate it later when there’s more privacy.

After a struggle and a few pinched fingers, the box remains closed. Frustrated, {0.SimFirstName} throws the box into a nearby fire pit and watches it burn. If {M0.he}{F0.she} can’t have the hidden prize, nobody will...
{0.SimFirstName} agrees to leave the Galma citizens to their activities and look the other way in exchange for credits. All in a day’s work!

{0.SimFirstName} fixes the droid. With a series of chirps and beeps, the little droid extends an arm in thanks, presenting a small box. {0.SimFirstName} takes the box to open when {M0.he}{F0.she} returns to the First Order District. A gift from a new friend! What a day!

{0.SimFirstName} inspects the pile carefully and finds a package hidden inside. {0.SimFirstName} hears more citizens approaching and swiftly pockets it. {M0.he}{F0.she} will open it when there’s more privacy at First Order District.
Pry It Open
Slice It with Dataspike

Droid battles are illegal! {0.SimFirstName} breaks it up. As the Galma citizens scatter, {0.SimFirstName} spies a box dropped in the dust amidst the chaos. {M0.He}{F0.She} will open it when {M0.he}{F0.she} returns to the First Order District. After collecting the box, {0.SimFirstName} notices a secret compartment, locked with a keypad.
{0.SimFirstName} is quite convincing. The Galma citizens are susceptible to {M0.his}{F0.her} charm and fork over even more credits.
As {0.SimFirstName} pushes {M0.his}{F0.her} luck, the Galma citizens show signs of anger. It’s best to take the original bribe and go… immediately.

Flying overhead, {0.SimFirstName} sees Peka community members scattering and fleeing indoors. They must be up to something! {0.SimFirstName} lands and investigates. {M0.He}{F0.She} sees several huts and a structure by the river. In the distance, {0.SimFirstName} hears what sounds like a large bird squawking.

Fly Low

“Ah, there’s no shame in that! Live to fight another day, or in your case, live to run another day!” teases Hondo. The crew hurries to load the remaining crate and lifts off. The ground troopers open fire on the Falcon but the deflector shields hold true. As they race away, the TIE echelon pursues them.

{0.SimFirstName} produces a blaster and begins firing at the First Order stormtroopers. Chewbacca fires from cover while Hondo loads the remaining crate. The small crew board the Falcon and take off. The ground troopers open fire on the Falcon but the deflector shields hold true. As they race away, the TIE echelon pursues them.

{0.SimFirstName} produces a thermal detonator, activates it, and throws. “YES!” cheers Hondo as the devastating device hurls through the air. It lands next to the First Order transport and explodes, destroying the vehicle and propelling nearby stormtroopers into the air.\n\nThe small crew swiftly pushes the final crate onto the Falcon and take off. The ground troopers open fire on the Falcon but the deflector shields hold true. As they race away, the TIE echelon pursues them.

“Hello, my friends! Not to worry, we’re here on official business on behalf of Lt. Agnon! We have identification here.” Hondo says as he elbows {0.SimFirstName} who hands over the fake ID card. “Wait here while we verify.” the stormtrooper directs. As the troopers examine the card, the small crew quietly slips into the Falcon and take off. “Hey! Come back here!” yells the stormtrooper. They all open fire on the Falcon but the deflector shields hold true. As they race away, the TIE echelon pursues them.
Fire at TIE echelon

The Millennium Falcon rises above the Surabat vicinity in an attempt to flee the First Order assault. {0.SimFirstName} does {M0.his}{F0.her} best to dodge the barrage of laser fire. The crew is going to need to get the TIE echelon off their backs soon or they’ll never leave Batuu!
Fire at Spire Formations

The Millennium Falcon flies low to the ground while the TIE echelon pursues them. {0.SimFirstName} steers toward the forest of towering spires. “Good idea, they’ll never find us after we’ve hit a spire and exploded into millions of pieces!” shouts Hondo. The Falcon twists and turns, weaving between the petrified spires while the TIE echelon follows closely behind.
Head to Coruscant

Chewbacca moves to the main gun and fires on the TIE echelon. The imposing ship dodges the first few shots but one laser hits their wing. The TIE echelon begins to smoke and makes an emergency landing. The Falcon quickly pulls up and exits Batuu’s atmosphere.

Chewbacca moves to the main gun and fires at the spires. Chunks of petrified trees fly everywhere. The base of one spire fractures and collapses into another spire. A chain reaction of falling spires careens toward the TIE echelon which diverts to avoid the chaos. The Falcon quickly pulls up and exits Batuu’s atmosphere.
Fly to Takodana

“Did I ever tell you about the time I sold empty crates? Things got messy when the buyer asked to inspect their product. Even I had a hard time talking my way out of that one! Ha! Well, let’s meet my associate on Kessel and pick up my off-the-books spice.”\nThe small crew arrives on Kessel. Chewbacca and {0.SimFirstName} load the containers as Hondo chit-chats with his associate. They bid farewell and Hondo boards the Falcon. “RAWWRRR!” roars Chewbacca. “Do I trust my associate? Of course not! But business is business!”

{0.SimFirstName}’s droid quickly moves to a control panel and triggers the doors to close, locking away the pirates. “Sometimes the path to profit is the simplest one!,” Hondo exclaims. The group collects as much loot as they can carry and return to the Falcon.

“Where’s your sense of adventure? I’m sure we could take them… if we properly armed ourselves.” teases Hondo. “You’re right, you’re right. I’m a legitimate businessman and we should finish our legitimate business!” The crew continues to Takodana and exchanges the spice for a healthy sum of credits.

“That was thrilling, and profitable! Now let’s finish the job we started, my friend!” The crew flies to Takodana and meets with the buyer. Hondo exchanges the spice for a healthy sum of credits. “Ah, the only thing better than credits is more loot to keep them company!”

Hondo hands over a bag of credits “Here’s your share, my friend. What was it we agreed to? An 80-20 split?” {0.SimFirstName} gives him a no-nonsense look. “Good, good! I’m impressed with your tenacity. Let’s make it 70-30. Ha ha!”
Fly Into Asteroid Field with Droid
Fly Around Asteroid Field

Boom! The Millennium Falcon shudders as it’s pelted with laser blasts. “Pirates!” shouts Hondo, “But how could they have known? That rat associate must have sold me out!” Boom! Another shot shakes the ship. “We’re not going to outrun them unless you’re confident enough to fly into that asteroid field!”
Investigate Ship

{0.SimFirstName} steers into the asteroid field with the help of {M0.his}{F0.her} droid on navigation. The Millennium Falcon fires back at the ship while it weaves through the asteroids with ease. “Don’t you scratch my ship!” shouts Hondo. “RAAWWWRR!” Chewbacca adds. “Yes, fine… Chewie’s ship. Don’t scratch Chewie’s ship.” \n\nThe pirates pursue the Falcon into the field but smash the side of their ship into an asteroid and begin careening out of control. The chase appears to be over. Should the crew continue their mission or investigate the wreck?
Fire at Pirates
Fire Warning Shots

“A wise decision! No good ever came from giant flying rocks.” joked Hondo. “Go get on the main gun and show us what you’ve got, Ace!” says Hondo as he gestures toward the back of the cockpit. {0.SimFirstName} climbs the ladder to the main gun and gets into position.

Chewbacca flies the Falcon in a loop and positions the ship over the pirates. {0.SimFirstName} takes aim and fires. Boom! The pirate vessel rotates helplessly and the chase appears to be over. Should the crew continue their mission or investigate the wreck?

{0.SimFirstName} aims around the aggressive pirate vessel and fires multiple warning shots. Hondo shouts, “Have you heard the expression “If you want something, fire warning shots”? No! Let’em have it!”
Flee to Falcon
Lock Door with Droid
Return Fire with Blaster

“Usually, I try not to enter wrecked ships full of angry pirates...but I also try not to pass up any looting opportunities!” Hondo jokes. The Millennium Falcon docks aside the mangled ship and the crew enter.\n\nUpon entering the ship a hail of blaster fire unleashes on the group. They take cover behind a stack of nearby crates. The blaster fire stops and {0.SimFirstName} uses this moment to take action.

Pew Pew Pew! The rain of blaster fire overwhelms Hondo, Chewbacca, and {0.SimFirstName}. The three turn and race back into the Falcon. “Some prizes aren’t worth the fight. Let’s focus on our other business!” yells Hondo as they detach from the wreck.

{0.SimFirstName} pulls out a blaster and dives into action. Blue stun rings fly out and hit pirate after pirate until they’re all unconscious on the floor. Hondo’s jaw hangs in amazement, “We’re going to have to do this again! I didn't know you had it in you, my friend! Absolutely stunning!” \n\nChewbacca, Hondo, and {0.SimFirstName} collect as much loot as they can carry and return to the Falcon.

{0.SimFirstName} is piloting the TIE echelon through space when suddenly, two Resistance fighters appear out of hyperspace. The ships, surprised by the unexpected confrontation, move in to engage the TIE echelon. {0.SimFirstName} fires and immobilizes one of the ships. The other Resistance vessel, realizing they're outmatched, turns to flee. The echelon fires and destroys the ship before it can escape! Lt. Agnon is pleased with {0.SimFirstName}'s performance and awards {M0.him}{F0.her} with a bonus.

{0.SimFirstName} patrols Batuu looking for any signs of the Resistance. {M0.He}{F0.She} spots a column of smoke in the distance. A crashed transport! The TIE echelons lands and the crew disembarks to investigate. A group of smugglers in the transport spot the First Order crew and drop their cargo. "Freeze! You're under arrest!" {0.SimFirstName} seizes the contraband and takes some for {M0.himself}{F0.herself}.

{0.SimFirstName} is piloting the TIE echelon through space. They come across a disabled freighter ship, drifting through space. {0.SimFirstName} and crew board the ship and find it's been abandoned in a hurry. This could be a Resistance vessel! The crew gather evidence. {0.SimFirstName} spots some credits and contraband and claims them for {M0.himself}{F0.herself}.

{0.SimFirstName} flies the TIE echelon over Batuu. Without warning, the echelon is hit! A Resistance X-wing! The weapons systems are down and the deflector shields are taking a beating. There are only two choices. Retreat to Black Spire Outpost or be destroyed! {0.SimFirstName} flees to the outpost, not looking forward to the awkward conversation with Lt. Agnon...

{0.SimFirstName} is piloting the TIE echelon through space. A suspicious ship is flying toward Batuu. The echelon approaches and the ship quickly evades and begins to flee. They dart into an asteroid field and {0.SimFirstName} proudly gives chase. The misguided move resulted in hull damage of the TIE echelon and the fleeing ship got away... Repairs will be required and Lt. Agnon will be severely disappointed.

As the TIE echelon explores, a group of aggressive pirate vessels ambush the First Order ship. They board the echelon and take the crew prisoner. The Quarren pirate leader forces {0.SimFirstName} to send an all clear message, clearing the way for a large smuggling operation. "It's been a pleasure doing business with you!" laughs the captain as he opens fire on the echelon's controls before leaving. {0.SimFirstName} makes some hasty repairs and pilots the damaged TIE echelon back to Batuu. The crew are left with their lives but have lost their pride.
{0.SimFirstName} has a fantastic and relaxing trip, exploring the galaxy.

{0.SimFirstName} leaves Batuu to rendezvous with another Resistance member. On the way to the meetup, {0.SimFirstName} finds {M0.himself}{F0.herself} face-to-face with two First Order TIE fighters! Remaining calm, {0.SimFirstName} trusts {M0.his}{F0.her} instincts and artfully dodged the barrage of fire from the TIE fighters. After performing numerous difficult maneuvers, {M0.he}{F0.she} lines up a shot and fires. Boom! One of the TIE fighters is destroyed! The other TIE quickly flees the area and {0.SimFirstName} makes the rendezvous and returns to Vi Moradi with critical information.

Flying over Batuu, {0.SimFirstName} sees a few broken shipping crates that are scattered amongst the landscape. With no other ship or speeder in sight, {M0.he}{F0.she} lands and investigates. The crates appear to have been hastily discarded by a smuggler. {0.SimFirstName} grabs whatever may be useful before returning to the Resistance Encampment.

{0.SimFirstName} flies the X-wing over Batuu and notices someone struggling with a broken down speeder. {M0.He}{F0.She} lands to help. After finding some spare parts in the X-wing, {0.SimFirstName} helps make repairs on the speeder for a very appreciative Bith. To show their thanks, the Bith gives {M0.him}{F0.her} some credits and a small metal container. {0.SimFirstName} will check out the gift after they return to the Resistance Encampment.

{0.SimFirstName} explores Batuu and decides to take a swim in the Peka community. After landing the X-wing in a secluded area, {0.SimFirstName} dives into the refreshing water. When {M0.he}{F0.she} emerges, {M0.he}{F0.she}'s faced with a First Order patrol! They ask for ID and {0.SimFirstName} panics. A fight breaks out with a pair of stormtroopers. {0.SimFirstName} narrowly avoids capture by diving into the water and swimming downstream. {M0.He}{F0.She} sneaks to the X-wing and stealthily flies back to the Resistance Encampment. {0.SimFirstName} gets away but thinks the troopers got a good look at {M0.his}{F0.her} face...

{0.SimFirstName} heads out over the forests of Batuu to explore in the X-wing. In a remote area, {M0.he}{F0.she} decides to practice firing the laser cannons, targeting a cluster of tall spires. BOOM! A large chunk of spire broke off and crashed to the ground. Unfortunately, it landed on the cart of a local settler. {0.SimFirstName} landed and apologized profusely. Luckily no one was harmed! After helping to repair the cart, {0.SimFirstName} leaves feeling guilty and embarrassed for what had happened...

{0.SimFirstName} flies from Batuu to explore the galaxy. Shortly after leaving orbit, the lone X-wing is flanked by a pair of First Order TIE fighters! {0.SimFirstName} skillfully evades fire and makes a run for an asteroid field in search of cover. The TIE fighters know better than to follow but, unfortunately, the maze of asteroids is too treacherous for the X-wing to pass through safely. After sustaining damage, {0.SimFirstName} limps back to the Resistance Encampment...

Chewbacca discovers a stowaway aboard the Falcon! They plead with {0.SimFirstName} to let them go. In exchange for their safe delivery back to Black Spire Outpost, they've agreed to give a gift. {0.SimFirstName} can't wait to see what it is!

Chewbacca and {0.SimFirstName} fly over Batuu and spot a crash site near the Galma vicinity. It looks abandoned so they decide to land the Falcon and investigate. They find a small locked container which they bring back to Black Spire Outpost to open...

Hondo and Chewbacca made a little wager about how long it would take to retrieve a shipment from Kijimi and return it to Black Spire Outpost. {0.SimFirstName} eagerly accepts the challenge. They race across the galaxy in the Falcon and complete the round trip in an astonishingly short time. "I'm impressed, my friend! You brought me the shipment in record time! Here's something for your trouble!" cheers Hondo.

Chewbacca and {0.SimFirstName} decide to take a fun trip to another system in the Outer Rim. Chewbacca spins up the hyperdrive but nothing happens. Upon further inspection, {0.SimFirstName} realizes that someone's been tampering with the ship. They'll have to land and make repairs...

{0.SimFirstName}, in an effort to impress Chewbacca, decided to perform some risky maneuvers while flying over Batuu. Unfortunately, the size of the Falcon takes some getting used to and {0.SimFirstName} managed to scratch the hull. "Wah! snort-snort-snort!" laughs Chewbacca. {0.SimFirstName} is humiliated!

Chewbacca and {0.SimFirstName} make a run to pick up ship parts in another system. On the way, they decide to play a game of dejarik. Chewbacca easily beats {0.SimFirstName} at the game... it wasn't even close! {0.SimFirstName} is embarrassed by the loss. {M0.He}{F0.She} certainly didn't have to let the Wookiee win...

Move In
Just don't tell anyone I told you that...
Whoops! I shouldn't have said all that. Hopefully this can be our little secret.
Wow, it felt great to get that off my chest. Thanks for listening!

Thanks for bringing me the prototype; It'll really level the playing field! In exchange for your troubles, take this disruption device. Use it on any control panel in the First Order District. It'll give you the encryption sequence for the secure door in the First Order Cargo building. Alright... I kept up my end of the bargain. 'Til the Spire!

So you're the newbie. I'll tell you what you came for, but I want something in return. The First Order is developing a prototype blaster rifle. A small shipment of the prototypes just arrived and they're being stored in a supply crate in the First Order Cargo building. Swipe one for me and we can go from there...

This is the First Order occupied sector of Batuu. Here you can find Lt. Agnon as well as the Droid Depot if you are looking to acquire your very own droid companion.
First Order District

The Resistance Encampment is located deep in the forests of Batuu. Rumor has it that you can find Vi Moradi, the famous Resistance spy. However, you will need to earn the trust of the Resistance before they will accept you with open arms.
Resistance Encampment
This is the central hub of Batuu. Here you can find The Dwelling, Oga's Cantina, Dok-Ondar's Den of Antiquities, and a number of food and drink options.
Black Spire Outpost
Pets are forbidden in Batuu. They will need to remain at home while your Sims visit.
